## Spring 2026 Schedule

The Community Cycling Center is offering free drop-in bike repair clinics at locations across Portland this spring. Bring your bike, learn to fix it, ride home happy.

### Clinic Schedule

| Date | Time | Location |
|------|------|----------|
| April 5 | 10 AM - 2 PM | Cully Park, NE 72nd & Prescott |

### What to Expect

Our trained volunteer mechanics will help you with:
- Flat tire repair and tube replacement
- Brake and derailleur adjustment
- Chain cleaning and lubrication
- Safety checks and reflector installation

We provide all tools and most common parts (tubes, brake pads, cables) at no cost. For parts we don't stock, we'll help you find affordable options.

### Earn-a-Bike Program

Can't afford a bike? Our Earn-a-Bike program lets youth (ages 12-18) learn bike mechanics and earn a refurbished bike after completing 20 hours of shop time. Contact us at youth@communitycyclingcenter.org.

### About Us

Community Cycling Center is a Portland nonprofit that has been broadening access to cycling since 1994. We believe everyone deserves access to safe, affordable transportation.
